name: StarTele Logic
description:
StarTele Logic was founded in 2011 with the goal of delivering cutting-edge mobile apps development services.
We offer custom application development services and we have world best Golang Developers team, C/C++ Developer, Node.JS, WebRTC, Java, Open-Source Technology, Ruby, and Python and You can hire talented developers for any duration you want. 
Our developers are updated with latest trends and frameworks and will assist you with your project timelines, bring expertise and experience to your team. We provide the flexibility of choosing the best-suited engagement model to all our clients.
